TEXT.TITLE: LIEBERT CORP <LIEB> APPROVES MERGER
TEXT.BODY: Liebert Corp said its shareholders approved the merger of a wholly-owned subsidiary of Emerson Electric Co <EMR>. Under the terms of the merger, each Liebert shareholder will receive .3322 shares of Emerson stock for each Liebert share. Reuter
